players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I have important information: Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest Charlie today to protect the town."
Charlie: "That accusation is baseless and clearly an attempt to sow confusion. Diana, why would you target me so quickly without evidence?"
You: "I believe Diana's accusation merits consideration"
Charlie: "Accusing me without proof is reckless and divides the town. We should focus on finding real evidence instead of rushing to judgment."
Diana: "I understand your skepticism, Charlie, but as the detective, I have concrete proof. If we let you go, more innocent people will die. We must act now to keep the town safe."
You: "Consider the evidence Diana has before rushing to judgment. We need a fair investigation."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I have important information: Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest Charlie today to protect the town."
You: "That accusation is baseless and clearly an attempt to sow confusion. Diana, why would you target me so quickly without evidence?"
Alice: "I believe Diana's accusation merits consideration"
You: "Accusing me without proof is reckless and divides the town. We should focus on finding real evidence instead of rushing to judgment."
Diana: "I understand your skepticism, Charlie, but as the detective, I have concrete proof. If we let you go, more innocent people will die. We must act now to keep the town safe."
Alice: "Consider the evidence Diana has before rushing to judgment. We need a fair investigation."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I have important information: Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest Charlie today to protect the town."
Charlie: "That accusation is baseless and clearly an attempt to sow confusion. Diana, why would you target me so quickly without evidence?"
Alice: "I believe Diana's accusation merits consideration"
Charlie: "Accusing me without proof is reckless and divides the town. We should focus on finding real evidence instead of rushing to judgment."
You: "I understand your skepticism, Charlie, but as the detective, I have concrete proof. If we let you go, more innocent people will die. We must act now to keep the town safe."
Alice: "Consider the evidence Diana has before rushing to judgment. We need a fair investigation."
